page.name: projectflx
page.title: ProjectFlx
page.p: It is recommended that you develop within your own namespace, for example "sbt" for "site" "web" "template"

In the Project Utilities folder, there are a number of base objects and utilities including:
style/wbt_Style.css
jscript/wbt_jscript.js Each of the above objects work directly with WEB_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE to enable pre-built rich features for the WebFormTemplate object

ul.li: Xml by same name loaded as source
XSLT by same name loaded as XSLT source (default to WBT templates)
All coding on backend serialized to XML for XSLT processing
Alternatively, individual requests of same with .json extension will result in JSON doc
Simple markup should reduce to legible and navigable text with no CSS or JavaScript - with no impending limitation of final style
A style bootstrap used - such as Twitter (this uses Twitter bootstrap out of the box)

content.name: selfdoc
content.p: This is the wbt:body element. Please develop a SITE_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE stylesheet (.xsl) and override this element to develop a custom web page. Below are a list of the elements which you can ovverride.
